title: Totoro Watch Face for Wear
summary: Blink totoro watch face for Android Wear
description: The watch face is inspired by the Hayao Miyazaki animated film.The wallpaper is Totoro.Just like in the movie,it will accompany you all the time if you install the Totoro Watch FaceFeatures:âœ” Hour, Date, Month, Yearâœ” Animatic totoro âœ” Daily steps counterâœ” Resolution:320*320âœ”Round Watch Faceâœ” Concise & Power savingâœ” Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatchIf you have some suggestion,you can email me:androidwearxf@outlook.com
descriptionHTML:
The watch face is inspired by the Hayao Miyazaki animated film.The wallpaper is Totoro.Just like in the movie,it will accompany you all the time if you install the Totoro Watch Face

Features:
✔ Hour, Date, Month, Year
✔ Animatic totoro
✔ Daily steps counter
✔ Resolution:320*320
✔Round Watch Face
✔ Concise & Power saving
✔ Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch

If you have some suggestion,you can email me:androidwearxf@outlook.com
